1.content:
Welcome to the story please choose a pony you want to get fatter.

If you do not see someone you want please click other.

As writing.com only has a max of 5 choices in the beginning don't worry the other 2 members of the Mane 6 will be listed in the next chapter just click other to see them and choose another More Ponies will be added later.
1.title: Introduction

choices: Expiriment with Magic Gone Horribly Horribly Wrong
11.content: Ah the Main character herself such a pretty Alicorn. So then how and why does she get fat?
11.title: Princess Twilight Sparkle

111.content: So who is her feeder?
111.title: Willingly (Romance)

112.content: Ahhh, yes. The most common way to gain weight, being lazy. But how does our purple alicorn get so lazy?
112.title: Laziness

12.content:
What is causing Pudgie Pie to expand?

Option A; All of the pounds she should of been gaining begin to catch up to her.

Option B; Force Fed

Option C; She decides to gain weight

Option D; A magical entity starts to expand her

Option E; Other ideas (Don't end this path. Anyone should be able to add their own story ideas if they want to).
12.title: Pinkie Pie

123.content: Does she ask for help?
123.title: C

choices: To impress a stallion she likes
To help her win an eating contest
1232.content: Okay, but why is she gaining weight?
1232.title: No

choices: She has to rest off an injury.
She gets hooked on a new snack.
13.content: What's the cause of this?
13.title: Rainbow Dash

choices: She needs to test out her new super-calorie treats.
1331.title: Pinkie Pie

choices: Rainbow Dash begins to slowly gain weight.
The weight gain is delayed, so Rainbow Dash won't notice until later.
1333311.content:
Fluttershy was trembling with nervousness as she set her newly acquired potion down on the counter. All she had to do was mix it with Rainbow Dash's drink for when she arrived and the plan would begin. She let out a surprised "eep!" as there was a knock on the door, and Rainbow Dash called from outside. Fluttershy than hurriedly mixed the potion in with the drink she would give Rainbow Dash before opening the door and greeting her friend. "Hey, Rainbow. Come right in. I was just getting some drinks and snacks ready for us."

"Thanks, Fluttershy. I probably won't eat too much though, I've got training later," Rainbow Dash replied as she sat down on the couch. Soon Fluttershy emerged with the snacks and drinks, not long into drinking her cider Rainbow Dash began to feel extremely hungry and dove in to the pile of snacks with reckless abandon. She began scarfing down several cookies at once while Fluttershy just sat back and smiled.
1333311.title: For her own desire.

choices: Fluttershy waits for future results on Rainbow Dash.
13333111.content: Rainbow Dash chowed down on the last cookie and saw that her belly had quite a noticeable bulge. "Oh jeez," RD said, with a bit of shock in her voice. "Those cookies were more fattening than I expected." "You can say that again." Fluttershy said, trying to hide her impressed tone. "I really need to work this off." Rainbow Dash said, heading for the door to take off. "Well Good luck." Fluttershy said to RD as she slowly flew away.
13333111.title: Rainbow Dash begins to slowly gain weight.

13333112.content: Rainbow Dash threw the last cookie into her mouth. She then leaned back, let out a burp and patted her belly. Fluttershy waited a few seconds for the results to kick in, but to her surprise, nothing was happening. "Well that's strange." Fluttershy said quietly. "What's strange?" Rainbow Dash asked, overhearing Fluttershy. Fluttershy slightly jumped, not expecting RD to have heard her. "I, uhh... I'm just surprised at how fast you ate those cookies." RD stared down at her gut, with hardly any noticeable difference. "Yeah, I guess that was pretty quick of me." Rainbow said, slowly getting back on her feet, and heading out. "Well, thanks for the cookies Flutters." Rainbow said, before flying off. Fluttershy watch Rainbow Dash fly away, and said to herself. "Looks like the potion's taking some time to take effect. But I'm sure it'll strike her soon." And sure enough it did...
13333112.title: The weight gain is delayed, so Rainbow Dash won...

choices: Fluttershy visits that day and tries to speed up the process.
Rainbow Dash slowly gains weight over the next week.
133331123.content: Rainbow Dash woke up the next morning feeling almost the same. She got out of bed and began her routine like normal. She was completely unaware of the new layer of padding that had been added all over her body. She decided to have a doughnut for breakfast, but as the sugary flavor hit her tongue it triggered something. She was REALLY hungry, a lot more than she usually was in the morning. She decided to eat a second doughnut, and then a third, and didn't stop until she had finished her forth and her stomach was stuffed to the limit. She laid back on a nearby couch, stunned at her own gluttony. "I should really go work this off, but that can wait until later," she thought to herself, also feeling strangely lazy today.
133331123.title: The next morning.

choices: Give Rainbow Dash some fattening foods, but make them look healthy.
Feed Rainbow Dash when she's asleep.
1333311231.content: Later that day, Fluttershy decided to stop by RD's place. She knocked on the door and heard some grunting inside. "Come.. On..In." RD said, Ash Fluttershy entered the room. She could see Rainbow Dash in the floor, doing push ups. She also looked a tad softer than when Fluttershy saw the other day. "So, you gained a bit from the cookies, huh?" Fluttershy asked, not wanting to sound rude. RD stopped to catch her breath. "Yeah, looks like it." She said, looking down at her belly. "Well maybe I can help coach you on your weight loss." Fluttershy suggested. "You'd do that? Thanks Fluttershy." Rainbow said, rushing over to hug her. Fluttershy already had everything planned out.
1333311231.title: Fluttershy visits that day and tries to speed u...

choices: Rainbow Dash takes a nap, waking up to find she's gained even more weight.
Rainbow and Fluttershy go to Sugarcube Corner to celebrate.
13333112311.content:
"Thanks again for helping me with my weight loss, Fluttershy." Rainbow Dash said happily as she prepared to take off.

"Oh don't mention it, Rainbow." Fluttershy replied, "As soon as you get tired come back here and by then I'll have some energizing snacks ready to help you keep going."

After Rainbow Dash took off Fluttershy quickly went to work putting together some "energy shakes" for Rainbow. She made sure to pack as many calories as possible into them while still being able to pass them off as simple boosters for Rainbow's workout. It wasn't very long before Dash returned, sweating and panting. "Phew, I'm more out of shape than I thought."

"Here, Rainbow. This will give you a boost." Fluttershy said with a friendly smiling, offering the newly made shake to Rainbow Dash. Rainbow accepted it and greedily chugged the entire thing.

"Wow, Fluttershy. That was delicious, I'll have to drink another one on my next break." The next break came sooner than Rainbow though, as she found herself strangely lower on energy. She could barely get any actual exercise in before becoming so tired she needed to stop. By the time the afternoon ended she had spent more time snacking than she had actually working out, and had consumed more than three times the normal calories for one day. She still seemed pleased with herself though. "Wow, that was a great workout. Thanks for your help Fluttershy."
13333112311.title: Give Rainbow Dash some fattening foods, but mak...

choices: She was getting worried and went to look for help.
133331123111.content: Rainbow Dash went back into the house to take a quick nap. She leapt onto her bed and slowly dozed off. She was starting to dream that she was thin again, muscular even. Feeling like she could overcome any challenge. She had her own audience cheering her on. Everything was swell for her, until she woke up after rolling off the bed. Rainbow felt strange, she walked, (which was starting to be more of a waddle,) over to her mirror. She was shocked to see that she was rounder than before. Not just in her belly this time, her legs were a tad thicker, her rump was looking softer, she could even see a double chin. (At least it wasn't TOO noticeable.) But Rainbow Dash knew she had to do something.
133331123111.title: Rainbow Dash takes a nap, waking up to find she...

choices: Twilight is actually in league with Fluttershy, but pretends to help.
1333311231112.content:
Rainbow Dash quickly left her house and went into Ponyville. She started off flying but had to stop and walk halfway as she started running out of breath, it was hard to ignore the fact that her plot jiggled a little with every step she made. She nervously walked up to the door of Twilight's library and knocked.

Soon the door opened as Twilight answered, "Hey, Rainbow Dash. Can I do something for you?"

"Yeah...this is really embarrassing, but I seem to be gaining weight really fast for some reason. Think you can help?"

"Sure," Twilight answered, "I'll figure out something."
1333311231112.title: She was getting worried and went to look for help.

13333112311121.content: Rainbow Dash slowly went inside, Twilight was a tad shocked and started examining her body. "Wow, what happened to you?" She asked Rainbow Dash. "I don't know." She told her, "It just started piling up," She said, slightly rubbing her belly. "So it is working." Twilight said in her thoughts. She then brought herself back to reality, "Well fear not Rainbow Dash, I could help you with..."
13333112311121.title: Twilight is actually in league with Fluttershy,...

choices: Pinkie Pie becomes attracted to Rainbow's new weight and pushes food on her.
133331123111211.content:
"I've got the perfect thing, just wait right here," said Twilight before scurrying to a back room. She then began to quickly put together ingredients for a drink that would intensify the effects of the potion which was making Rainbow Dash gain weight. Not only would Rainbow become even hungrier and lazier, the calories she consumed would have double effect.

Twilight then re-entered the main room and gave the drink over to Rainbow Dash. "Here, this should help you shake off that extra weight."

Rainbow Dash chugged down the drink, which had a delicious taste. "Thanks, Twi. I think I'm going to try working out some more now. Wish me luck." With that Rainbow Dash turned around and began walking out, entrancing Twilight slightly with the way her rump was starting to jiggle after each step.

She didn't get far however, Rainbow only managed to jog through a small part of town before getting tired out. She stopped for a rest when the scent of freshly baked cakes from Sugarcube Corner enticed her for a snack. Upon entering she was greeted by Pinkie Pie.

"Hiya, Rainbow. Do you need something?"

"I was just looking for a quick snack is all, got anything?" Rainbow answered, becoming hungrier by the moment.
133331123111211.title: "A drink"

choices: Her stallion-sized appetite catches up to her
14.content: What's the cause of this?
14.title: Applejack

141.content:
Applejack groans, rubbing her hoof against her temple as she rolls out of her bed. Harvest season wasn't for a while yet, so she'd slept until the sun was already well on its way through the sky.

Growl...

Or it would be, if her stomach hadn't woken her up. As it was, Celestia had hardly risen it an inch into the sky. Applejack sighed, glowering down at her belly once she realized the time. Her form was sturdy and strong, a testament to the years of her life spent on Sweet Apple Acres. Her recent eating had done little to affect her figure, save for her firm stomach gaining a little give to it.

"Why can't you jus' let me sleep on a day off?" She murmured quietly as she made for the door to her room. She slipped outside, taking care not to wake her family. Slipping downstairs, she stood in her kitchen, the delectable scents and smells of leftovers and sweet, delicious goodies waiting for her to eat.

Only one question was left- How would she start her breakfast?
141.title: Her stallion-sized appetite catches up to her

choices: Wash it down with some cider!
Twice the pie, twice the flavor!
1412.content:
The pie Granny'd left to cool on the sill last night sings a siren's call to Applejack's nose.

Ah did almost all of the work in makin' that pie... she thinks, 's only fair Ah get to have some.

Applejack gingerly lifts the pie tin from the windowsill, setting it by the hutch. She quickly plates herself up a heaping slice of the pie and dives in.

The delightful, sweet flavors of the fruit light up AJ's tastebuds like fireworks. She might have such pies often, but they never cease to amaze. She wolfs down the morsel, before extracting another slice from the tin and tucking in. Soon, her ears are met with the sound of fork against plate, along with a stomach growl. She moves, on autopilot, to grab another slice, and eats the whole thing in one bite before polishing off the rest of the pie at lightning speed.

Having finished the pie, she sets her sights on some other things in the kitchen, hoping they'll make a bigger dent in her hunger than that pie did.

What now?
1412.title: Apple Pie

14121.content:
Cider, of course! She always has a cup of cider after an apple pie, it's standard.

She digs through the cabinets and finds a glass of cider, still pretty new. The drink is swallowed down quick into Applejack's throat, flowing down to her stomach. The taste of sweet, mouthwatering cider filled her mouth whole.

"BURP! Oh my..."

She patted her small belly gut and smiled. But what to do now?
14121.title: Wash it down with some cider!

142.content: Somebody's been feeding AJ, but who is it?
142.title: Somepony's been feeding her

1423.content:
Caramel is officially married to Applejack. What he lack in strength, he make it up in marketing. After some persuasion, he managed to take over the business side after Granny Smith pass away. After browsing through all the documents, he discovered that he can maximise profits, production and availability.

He hired work ponies to collect the best quality apples. He funded a factory that rapidly produce apple goods. He set up stalls in the best location with the most ponies would visit such as train station and work station. Bits were flowing in to the Apple Family and they do not have to worry about being behind on tax.

Applejack was moved to the food production. She was the official food taster as she know what the best Apple products should taste like and how to improve it if necessary. Big Mac still wanted to buck Apples but have plenty more time with his family. Applebloom does not have to worry so much about the farm so she can concentrate on her current job as the teacher in the Friendship School.

Everything is going great but there was one thing he didn't put into account. Applejack constant snacking and tasting, and the lack of movement as she usually stay at one spot quickly expand her waistline. Her appetite grew overtime. At first, it wasn't noticeable but after a month Caramel can obviously see gotten a bit wider.

Ever since she become the official food taster, she become lazier and hungrier. She would wake up later as she doesn't have to wake up early to collect and organise the apples. Her meals become larger than the other members of the family and she was often seen snacking between meals. She claimed it as tasting for the best quality product. It was obvious that she just like eating.

Caramel make some small and not hurtful jokes about her weight. Applejack joked back that some stallions like a more hefty mare compare to the sticks at Canterlot. Caramel also notice another change to Applejack. She become more happy and playful with him. She explained that ever since you took over the business side, she become less stressful and more carefree. The increase in food intake represents how secure she is. The bigger she is, the more safe and happy she is. She doesn't have to worry to be fit and buck apples all day just to make the ends meet.

After hearing the explanation, Caramel become extremely caring to Applejack. As her husband, he would do the best to make her feel happy. He would wake her up only for meals. He prepare meals so large that Applejack would be stuffed. He placed snacks everywhere. He would even give her belly rubs, where most of the fat go to, to encourage her to relax and eat more.

After another month of this was going on, Applejack's appetite went rapid. She would avoid eating vegetables and other healthy food. Her diet is that each meals would feed three hard-working stallions. Her snacks are now a basket of sweets. She would only drink apple cider, heavy cream milk, milk shakes or heavily sugary drinks. She would hardly move and only walk when it is necessary. Applejack was extremely happy as she never felt this calm in her whole life. Caramel make every issue in her life go away.

Caramel is happy as long as Applejack is happy. Applejack is currently weigh as three stallions. She gained a double chin, two big bubbly butt cheeks and the most impressive part of her body is that humongous belly. Caramel would massage her belly and his hooves would sink into it.
Applejack would play with her belly and see how far it ripple after she slap it. Applejack exclaimed that she love the new lifestyle. All the food she could eat, a loving husband that encourage her to live as she like, and a business that can keep the Apple family safe for generations.
1423.title: Caramel

143.content:
A devastating accident happened to Applejack. Luckily, she is alive and doing fine. However, the doctor said that she would never buck again or do any strenuous work at the farm. If she does, it would shatter her leg.

Applejack was obviously upset. She could not do many chores at the farm and other family members have to fill in for her. The only thing she could do is to be a vendor or eating. The lack exercise and still having the same appetite before the accident obviously increased her weight. Once a lithe athlete, now having quite a belly.

After two weeks from the accident, Applejack was sitting in Sugar Cube Corner, eating her sundae unhappily. Pinkie approached her when there is no other customers waiting in line.

"Hiya AJ. How are you doing?" Pinkie greeted her with a wide smile.

"Not daisy. Ah could not do anythin' but chew. Look at maah belly. Ahm goin' t' be as big as a whale duhrectly," Applejack pinched her belly and shook it to emphasis her weight. She gained at least 10 pounds.

"Don't worry AJ. I know you will can do something despite the injury," Pinkie patted Applejack's belly.

"What kay-yun ah do? All ah know what ta do is fuh-armin,'" Applejack shoved the rest of the ice cream in her mouth fuming.

"There is a job I can recommend,"
143.title: An injury in the fields

choices: A local ma and pa's store. Start out slow.
A local buffet. Decent pay job.
Fast Food Chain. It's really tough but you wanted the bits, right?
1433.content:
"Food Disposal? Like throwin' away food. Ya know ah 'ate wastin' perfectly good food."

Pinkie Pie shook her head and clarified the job, "You got it wrong Applejack. They paid ponies to eat their leftover food before they gone bad rather than throwing them away."

"Why? Idnit cheaper jus' t' chuck 'em away?" Applejack was sceptical with that fact.

"Sorry. You are not in the restaurant business so you may not not heard this rule. In one of the rules, restaurants that operate in Equestria must paid a hefty fine for wasting good food. Caught throwing food away can result in temporary closure in the restaurant and additional training on why you should not waste food. It encourages restaurants not be wasteful with the produce and give away food to the needy."

"Why not sent some t' thuh orphanages? Hay done needed thuh food," Applejack rebuttled.

"Of course but orphanages don't accept a ton of food in a day. Restaurants and fast food chains fight for the rights on which organisation would accept their food and if the organisations would accept them. Like school camps would not like to get only junk food or food drive only accepting bread. It's a tough thing for the food business to work around with."

"Ah see what this leadin' ta."

"This law create a new line of work called the 'Food Disposal'. Ponies were hired to eat the leftovers. The business would not have to worry if they have ordered too much or too little. Restaurants don't want to see displeased customers when they are out of food or paying hefty fine for overspending on produce. That is why I was hired by the Cakes. I make pastries and eat any leftover."

"Ifin' this is thuh case, why is it so unheard awf? Why isn't there a herd awf ponies signin' uhp for free food?"

"In the contract it stated that any food that they did not consume would come out of their paycheck. Some would be more than their paychecks and would come out of their savings. It prevent ponies just wanting to get a free meal. Imagine being paid 100 bits but unable to do it, they would fine you 500 bits. You are not allowed to throw away the food to hide from them."

"Ah see," Applejack stared at her belly, "Do ya thihnk ah'm uhp ta thuh task?"

"Of course," Pinkie poked Applejack's belly as she stared directly into Applejack's eyes, "You have an appetite of a stallion when you were a foal. I bet you have a bigger appetite that can meet the requirements."

After thinking for a moment, Applejack came up with the answer, "Okay. Ahm willing to take the job. What should ah do first? Ah wanna to make bits as much as Ah can and quickly as possible for maah fuh-amily."

"I would recommend......."
1433.title: Food Disposal

15.content:
Here are the remaining 2 members of the Mane 6 Fluttershy and Rarity.

And from choice 3 of this chapter onwards is fair game for background ponies and side ones, as well as antagonists.
15.title: Other

151.content:
Insert joke about her being a marshmallow here

Seriously though why would she gain weight?

Is her latest crush into fat mares?

Is she experimenting with plus-size fashion and lacking a suitable test subject she has no choice but to use herself?

Or is it a result of 1 of Rainbows pranks gone wrong?
151.title: Rarity

1513.content: Was this a pranked or did someone feed her?
1513.title: Pranked

152.content:
Why is poor Blubbershy getting fattened up (or inflating if that is your fetish)?

Option A; Force Feeding

Option B; Decides to try out expansion

Option C; Other ideas (don't end this path. Anyone should be able to add their own stories)
152.title: Fluttershy

1523.content: She gets hypnotized into becoming fat?
1523.title: C

15232.content: She got cursed by gaining weight nonstop?
15232.title: No

155.content: From here on it's fair game for background ponies and side ponies and antagonists.
155.title: Other

1552.content:
So you've Chosen the Zebra exotic enchantress and Alchemist? I admire your tastes.

So how and why does she get fat?

Ps. If you're having trouble writing her dialogue since she almost always speaks in rhyme, I suggest using the website http://www.rhymezone.com/ to help you come up with solutions. Just put in a certain keyword you want/need to use and it will generate a list of what rhymes with it, based both spelling and sounds like. And you'll be able to pick out what word matches best with what you have in mind from there.
1552.title: Zecora

15521.content: So who is her feeder?
15521.title: Willingly (Love)

choices: Sugercube Corner, with lots of cakes for Zecora to eat
Sweet Apple Acres, with a whole lot of Apple Family pies and treats to feed her.
155211.content:
Zecora walked through Ponyville, a smile on her lips as she looks over towards the Stallion walking beside her. It has been five weeks since she and Big Mac had begun dating after a few months of getting to know each other. Zecora was almost as surprised as every other pony when the red member of the Apple family had asked her out on a date.

They met when Zecora cured his Laryngitis in time for the turkey call competition (see the episode "Filli Vanilli" for details), from then on Big Mac began to pay her visits along with Applebloom and sometimes even going there alone, at first the visits were a means of giving thanks, then they became supply runs for spices used in Granny Smith's cooking, during his visits he would talk frequently with Zecora, after a while... he began to fall in love with her. So that Big Mac asking her out on a 1st date was inevitable, she was quick to accept the invitation and the others that soon followed. Tonight's date would indeed be a special one.

"Big Mac, if I might, Can I ask where we are going tonight?" She asked the silent stallion curiously. When Big Macintosh came to pick her up from her hut, he had said that there was something special he had planned for her tonight as well as something he wanted to tell her. Big Mac however simply chuckled and smiled,

"Just a little while more," he answered, "We're almost there."

"Aww Big Mac please my sweet pea, Can you at least say what you wanted to tell me?"

"Just a round the corner, sweetie pie." Big Mac indicated with a smile.

Turing the corner Zecora saw that they had arrived at...
155211.title: Big Mac

155212.content:
1. Canon Character

or

2. An OC
155212.title: Somepony Else.

1552122.content:
Zecora have been living with a spectacular chef unicorn for a month. His name is Sweet Venture. They have bumped into each other at the market one day. Some things lead into another and now they are in an official relationship. As he was planning to move Ponyville to work and live closer to her, Zecora invited him to her home and allowed him to live there. Originally, Zecora offered a good deal on the rent but Sweet Venture counter-offer with a better deal. He would prepare her lavish meals everyday as he was trained from a prestigious chef school. He specialised in sweets and pastries.

When he first presented her breakfast, she was surprise how much he had made just for her. A high stack of pancakes smothered in syrup, a plate full of hay bacon, a glass of creamy milk, a whole plate of scrambled eggs, a half dozen of harsh browns and bunch of buttered toast. The meal can easily feed three ponies. Zecora initially thought he was joking but she quickly realise he was not. Not to be rude, she shoved one of the pancake into her mouth. As soon as her tongue touch the pancake, she went into bliss. She couldn't describe how wonderful it is. It was the most perfect pancake she have ever tasted. This make Pinkie Pie's cooking seem amateurish. She couldn't help herself but kept shovelling food into her gaping mouth. Sweet Venture was pleased with the result.

Zecora patted her stomach as she finish off her meal. Her belly bulge out with all the food in her stomach. Zecora smack her lips as she finish every crumbs off her plate. She moaned as she rubbed her belly. She believed that it was a one time only thing as she thought he just wanted to impress her with his cooking and it was his first day living here.

Fortunately, she was wrong. Each meal afterwards (Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, Desert, Midnight snack (more like a feast)) have become more extravagant, heartier, heavier and more delicious. She couldn't denied any food she was given from him. Initially, Zecora was worried about her sudden increase of her weight but Sweet Venture ensure her it was nothing and even encourage her to eat more. He would even leave snacks everywhere in her house.

So Zecora kept eating and eating. At the end of the month she was....
1552122.title: Lost Control

15521222.content:
She was outright obese. Her constant eating and snacking had ballooned her weight. Her weight soared to being as heavy as 5 average stallion. She have the appetite of 5 stallions as well. It was really surprising for her to more than quintuple her weight in less than a month. Her golden rings have to be removed as it had become too tight for her to wear. Throughout that month, every time the Zecora mention about her sudden weight gain, Sweet Venture would shut down the conversation and persuade her to eat more.

Ever since Sweet Venture enter her home, her whole lifestyle have change. Before she would exercise often, went out to the market, search and collect herbs, make potions and have light meals with home-brew tea. Now, she having trouble getting out of bed. Her only entertainment was watching movies on a projection and reading books within arm reach. She could make a proper concoction as her appetite and belly would get in her way. Her belly became a alarm clock. Her stomach would rumbled to wake her up to get ready to eat breakfast (or any other meals). Her blubbery belly would held her down on her bed and she always need to rock her belly back and forth to roll off her bed. Sweet Venture made a custom-made bellyboard for Zecora to move around in her home. Her belly was so large that it would touch and smothered the ground while standing up on all four of her hooves. The bellyboard helped her not to drag her stomach all over the floor. It was a strenuous task to crawled all the way to her table.

Sweet Venture greeted her like nothing was wrong and present her breakfast that would feed a small family. However, Zecora gobbled it all up like a starving monster. She demolished everything in front of her and not leaving a crumb left on her table.

"Zecora, we need to talk," Sweet Venture sat next to her.

Zecora was surprise to hear that. He never complained with the current living condition. Must be serious.

"I think we need a bigger house. I know a place that is in Ponyville that is closer to my job and closer to many services to make our lives easier. I think this is the best for us. As you are my marefriend, you don't have to worry about the payment of the house. I've been saving a lot and I want you to live with me. I will support you as much as I can."

Zecora thought about it. Her current home is quite cramp especially her growing size. She haven't left her house for a long time and even if she wanted to, she couldn't even fit out of her front door.

"Even if you want to stay here, I would still support your decision. It would just be harder to help you if you needed me when I am away for work. The new home is really close by and can poke my head in to see how you are doing. This is your choice. What do you pick?"
15521222.title: Obese

155212221.content:
"I believe it is the best to move in with you. Without you, I would stay blue," Zecora replied.

After a week of preparation, all of her belongings were packed up. Sweet Venture did all the work. He placed all of her belongings in the cart, leaving nothing left in her home. Zecora would had offered some help but went against it. She was just too big and constantly hungry to help. All she did for the whole week was sleep and eat. Now she weight about 6 fully-grown stallions. Zecora felt guilty for not doing anything but Sweet Venture didn't mind. He like to help her as much as he could. He hammered down the sign in front of her house stated that she was moving.

Zecora wanted to move out late at night as she doesn't want anybody to see her. He went along with her idea and prepare for the night trip. Originally, Zecora would walked herself with the aid of the belly board to the new home but she was absolutely exhausted just by moving only a few steps. Sweet Venture chuckled knowing it was an impossible task for her to get into town. He secretly brought in a second cart for Zecora to lie in. It was extremely embarrassing for her as Sweet Venture have to saw out a bigger door for Zecora to leave her home and needed to be levitated into the cart. Every simple task become quite impossible for Zecora to perform.

Even thought the cart was design to carry 6 ponies with room to spare, it was a tight fit for Zecora to settle in. Sweet Venture hid her under a tarp and ensure her that everything is secure. Sweet Venture pulled both carts with the aid of magic to their new home. During the trip, Zecora's stomach rumbled even if she just ate before she had left. Sweet Venture ensure her that they would have a feast when they get there. Sweet Venture would often hear Zecora moaning and grunting for trying to calm her belly.

When they got to the new home, Sweet Venture levitated Zecora out of the cart first and go through the back door. The back door was designed for Zecora to fit through. The ground floor was cluttered with cooking tools and furniture. There were no space for Zecora to lie down. Sweet Venture told Zecora that they would be living in the basement. The ground floor space is needed for business.

As he took Zecora to the basement, she was surprise with the space she was given. The basement could fit the whole Ponyville's marketplace. Sweet Venture told Zecora that he wanted the best for her and space should not be one of the problem. There was a pile of cushions for Zecora to lie on as bed mattresses are useless to her, a really large projection movie screen for her to binge to and most importantly, a custom made tube feeder poking out from the ceiling for Zecora if Sweet Venture could not directly feed her. Zecora was please with the new living space and started to pig out on the feast that Sweet Venture had prepared earlier for her. Sweet Venture knew that she would be extremely hungry when they get to their new home. While Zecora munching on all the delicious food she was given, Sweet Venture placed all of Zecora's belongings around her.
155212221.title: Moved into Ponyville

1552122211.content:
Many things have happen within that month. Sweet Venture decided to make his own business after some disagreement with his last boss. He made lots of connection in the community to get the best price for his ingredients. This lead to his business booming with success. His food were praise highly which rake in the bits. He use those profits to expand his business as well as feeding his marefriend.

To keep up with her marefriend's appetite, he went to every store, bakery, restaurant and fast food chain for their leftovers before closing time. He is in friendly-terms with all of them. He was often seen carrying cartloads of food each night but completely empty the next day. Ponies asked what he have done with them. He replied that somepony urgently needed them and he was willing to help. Most ponies theorise that the food are going to a either a local charity, a homeless shelter or an orphanage.

"Zecora, I'm back home. Business is getting bigger lately but not as fast as you," he only heard some kind of grumbled and munching sounds.

Zecora recently lost the ability to talk and move her limbs. Her mouth was tied to the tube feeder as she was constantly hungry 24/7. Her limbs were too heavy to lift. The only movement she can make is twisting her wrist slightly, movement of mouth, twitching of her ears, blinking of her eyes and the rumbling of her stomach when she is really hungry.

Before she lost the communication of speaking, she use a make up sign language with the combination of her eyes and ears. If there any words that she needed to say, Sweet Venture would remove the tube feeder and quickly put it back after finish talking. It's a painful process for her as she fought back against her hunger as her belly roared like a mighty beast.

Sweet Venture observed how her marefriend change. Now she almost filled the whole basement. Two former Dragon Lord Torch can fit in belly with room to spare. He smiled as he belly flopped onto Zecora's belly. He described her belly as the soft and squish as a marshmallows and wobbly as a jelly. He steadily crawled up her belly toward her head.

"Hi honey. How are you feeling?" he said as he kissed her on one of her massive cheeks.

She conveyed back the message with her sign language.

Hungry

"You are always hungry dear," Sweet Venture joked, "I will try to see if I can produce more food for you."

Thank you. How's your day?

"It's going swell. Business is doing well and I am thinking of expanding my business."

That's nice to hear.

Sweet Venture rest on her cheek as he listened to her marefriend's insatiable appetite. After a while, Sweet Venture asked her something important.

"Darling. You know we are running out of space here?"

Am I growing to fast?

"No Sweetie," as he hugged her fat, "There is more of you to love. I am thinking of moving to a bigger site for my business and for you. A place for you to freely expand and for me to grow my production."

Sound great.

"I have a couple of options. We could either go to the area close by the Crystal Empire or the area near the Appleloosa. Both offer large spaces and easy to expand later. They both extremely cheap to purchase land. You can choose."

After some thought, Zecora signed, I choose the....

info.brief_description: The Various Mares of Equestria start packing on the pounds for various reasons.
info.description:
Since my Interactive Stories do not get enough activity I decided Maybe I should appeal to a more massive audience, So I noticed there were no MLP Weight Gain Stories on this site or at least none of the interactive variety. The very few I could find didn't have Weight Gain as a main motif, and none of them allowed any kind of shipping.

So I decided to make one Here Shipping is allowed, and Weight Gain is the main motif.

Here's the only rules be glad there are so few;

1: Only Mares (that's the female ponies) get fatter.
2: Stay in the confines of the +13 rating.
3: I don't care who is shipped together, you can even add OC's if you want to. Nor do I care if magic is involved or not.
4: At least try to put some effort into the chapters, "she suddenly gained 400,000 pounds in 12 seconds for no reason" only comes across as lazy and boring. Since nobody on the internet likes to read anything the last thing I want is boring chapters, aside from the groundwork introductory ones that list characters and motivations.

That is all, I hope you at least try to enjoy reading this and thank you for putting up with my lame 4th wall humor, so please post chapters here, you won't regret it.
